title: Killers Amongst US: Bride sends out 'Save-the-Dates,' found stabbed 20 times, RULED SUICIDE! (episode 1)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst US: Bride sends out 'Save-the-Dates,' found stabbed 20 times, RULED SUICIDE! (episode 1)
description:
Teacher and bride-to-be Ellen Greenberg is found inside a locked apartment stabbed 20 times, including the back of the neck. It's ruled a suicide but does the evidence support the claim?  Listen as we learn more about the life of Ellen Greenberg.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Sandee Greenberg - Mother
  • Josh Greenberg - Father
  • Darryl Cohen - Former Assistant District Attorney, Fulton County, Georgia, Defense Attorney 
  • Dr. Angela Arnold - Psychiatrist, Atlanta Ga www.angelaarnoldmd.com 
  • Tom Brennan - Private Investigator for the Greenbergs


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
